entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
